EmailTemplate.description: Email template to send a notification to managment about Cheque Batch closure with report url attachment
EmailTemplate.name: Holiday Voucher Refund Cheque Batch Closure Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Holiday Refund Cheque Batch {!Cheque_Batch__c.Name} Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Cheque Batch {!Cheque_Batch__c.Name} is closed now. Please click the link to view Holiday Voucher Refund Cheques report. {!Cheque_Batch__c.Report_Url__c}
